mapper.select: select seq, id, title, content, filename, newfilename, readcount, downcount, regdate from pds order by regdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into pds(id, title, content, filename, newfilename, readcount, downcount, regdate) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{filename}, #{newfilename}, 0, 0, now())
mapper.select: select seq, id, title, content, filename, newfilename, readcount, downcount, regdate from pds where seq=#{seq}
